text: Hushpuckena River is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Hushpuckena is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "sunflowers are abundant". Variant names are "Bland Brake", "Hush-puck-a-haw River", and "Hushpucana River". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Bolivar County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Coahoma County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Sunflower County, Mississippi
title: Hushpuckena River
